name: Red Vs. Goo
description: An unfinished game jam that I may continue working on. It is a short rpg story about a kid named Red who goes on an adventure to save a town, defeat some goo-blins, bring balance to the elemental forces in the world, make some friends along the way, get lost in a misty forest, make a few somewhat dated and obscure references, possibly retrieve a legendary sword, and maybe stop the spread of an encroaching evil force of darkness before it is too late. This game has everything crammed into it that I could fit in, except maybe an original plot.
